title: How 'vitally important' substitutions gave Rosenoir 'huge win' over Napoli

BBC Sport pundits Nedum Onuoha and Stephen Warnock analyse why the link-up between Joao Pedro and second-half substitute Cole Palmer was the catalyst for Chelsea's 3-2 win over Napoli.
